forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 52F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.
